abstract: Philadelphia's Barnes Foundation names Thomas Collins as executive director; Collins, who is originally from Philly and has served many museums in his career, is leaving directorship of Perez Art Museum Miami.
lead_paragraph: Thomas Collins, who has led the Pérez Art Museum Miami through a capital building program, has been named executive director of the Barnes Foundation in Philadelphia.
snippet: Thomas Collins, who has led the Pérez Art Museum Miami through a capital building program, has been named executive director of the Barnes Foundation in Philadelphia.

keywords.value: Perez, Jorge M, Art Museum of Miami-Dade County
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Barnes Foundation Recruits Director From Miami
headline.print_headline: Barnes Foundation Recruits Director From Miami
